node.title: Fall'in in love with Javascript

speakers.title: No sugar please: a tearing down of abstractions
speakers.name: David Demarais-Michaud
speakers.synopsis: To demistify one of JS' hotest bits of syntax sugar and the familiar Promise, David will break down the mechanics of both async patterns by building his own naive variations of those language features.

speakers.title: DÃ©velopper une App Tablette, Desktop & Web avec React&React-Native
speakers.name: Kim Reeves
speakers.synopsis: The folks at Turbulent have been working hard using React and React-Native to bring quality, cross platform JS products to market. Today, they will show us the patterns, structures and challenges of building large scale cross platform apps.

node.blurb: Syntax sugar and React-Native. Makes for excellent JS-Tea.
